content.raw: I dont know exactly what is the PR, maybe it is <real_time_update_rate>. In my test on this branch and in Nima_Integration branch, I did not assign the <real_time_update_rate>, so gazebo attempted to run the simulation as fast as possible and the simulation goes faster. we should see the effect of this change in challenging behavior like walking.
content.html: I dont know exactly what is the PR, maybe it is <real_time_update_rate>. In my test on this branch and in Nima_Integration branch, I did not assign the <real_time_update_rate>, so gazebo attempted to run the simulation as fast as possible and the simulation goes faster. we should see the effect of this change in challenging behavior like walking.
